dcterms:description: A dataset for semantic segmentation containing images from urban street scenes, with pixel-level annotations for various classes.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes

dcterms:description: A dataset for image classification containing 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 classes, with 50,000 training images and 10,000 test images.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:description: A coarsely labeled subset of the Cityscapes dataset, used for semi-supervised semantic segmentation.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes (coarsely labeled subset)
